Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Thorndale. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Thorndale.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Purple Line Express Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Purple Line Exp trains running w/residual delays & congestion following earlier mechanical problem at Thorndale. Service resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Purple Line Express Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Thorndale. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
